source_text: Aurumin retains a 2% net smelter return royalty on gold production above 12,000 ounces and on all other minerals, and Beacon have released an initial Reserve of 21,100 oz Au. 5, 8
additional_details: Royalty is retained by Aurumin and payable by Beacon Minerals Limited (Beacon) on gold production above 12,000 ounces and on all other minerals from the Mt Dimer Mining Tenements.
